sentences.en: A bit of embrocation will soothe your bruised knee.
sentences.cn: 用一点搽剂可使你那青肿的膝部消肿.

sentences.en: A hot cloth pressed against your jaw will usually soothe a toothache.
sentences.cn: 把热毛巾放在下巴上一般能缓解牙痛.

sentences.en: An unusual rhythm will soothe the ear.
sentences.cn: 会有一非同凡响的节奏悦人之耳.

sentences.en: He would take her in his arms and soothe her.
sentences.cn: 他会把她揽在怀中抚慰她。

sentences.en: Her comfortable voice seemed to soothe James for once.
sentences.cn: 她安慰的声音好像总算使詹姆士平静下来.

sentences.en: I tried my best to soothe his anger.
sentences.cn: 我尽力劝慰他不要生气.

sentences.en: I've managed to soothe him down a bit.
sentences.cn: 我想方设法使他平静了一点.

sentences.en: Inhalations can soothe and control the cough.
sentences.cn: 吸入药剂可以缓解并抑制咳嗽。

sentences.en: Lucy soothed the baby by rocking it in her arms.
sentences.cn: 露西把宝宝抱在怀里摇晃着，让他安静下来。

sentences.en: She made a cup of tea to soothe her nerves.
sentences.cn: 她泡了杯茶让自己平静下来。

sentences.en: Socrates tried to soothe us, true enough.
sentences.cn: 诚然,苏格拉底想安慰我们.

sentences.en: Stupidly, he reached out a hand to soothe her.
sentences.cn: 他笨拙地伸出一只手去,想抚慰抚慰她.

sentences.en: The music seemed to soothe a poison out of them.
sentences.cn: 音乐之声似乎缓解着他们所中的毒.

sentences.en: This cream contains a mild analgesic to soothe stings and bites.
sentences.cn: 这种乳膏含有一种性能平和的止痛剂,能缓解被螫咬后的疼痛.

sentences.en: This medicine should soothe your sore throat.
sentences.cn: 这种药会减轻你的喉痛.

sentences.en: Trying to soothe her only made matters worse.
sentences.cn: 安慰她只能使事情变得更糟.

sentences.en: We did not know how to soothe the bereaved mother.
sentences.cn: 我们不知如何安慰那位丧子的母亲.

words.tran_cn: 安慰；减轻痛苦（soothe的现在分词）

trans.tran_en: to make someone feel calmer and less anxious, upset, or angry

trans.tran_cn: 安慰，缓和，使平静，减轻痛苦
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel calmer and less anxious, upset, or angry
